news.title: Indore airport to acquire 20.48 acre of land below Bijasan Tekri for expansion
news.para: In October 2018, the state govt announced the allocation of the 20.48-acre land to the airport. However, the presence of a road traversing the land, connecting Maa Bijasan Temple and further towards Dhar Road.

news.title: Ludhiana: LIT awaits final notification on non-construction fee rebate
news.para: According to norms, construction is to be done on the allotted plot in a fixed time period. When allottees fail to start construction on time, they are liable to pay non-construction fee.

news.title: Chakan industrial area needs basic infrastructure to attract residential growth: Federation
news.para: Industry representatives also suggested building a modern primary health centre in the area, as the current one is not accessible, and proposed a solution for waste management issues.

news.title: Online registration for leave and licence agreements in Maharashtra face technical difficulties
news.para: Association members have complained of multiple problems with the online system, including UIDAI server authentication failures, malfunctioning thumb scanners and issues with photo uploads.

news.title: Unexpected property tax hikes frustrate Hubballi-Dharwad residents
news.para: DM Shanbhag, president of the Hubballi-Dharwad Citizens Forum, said that HDMC is hiding all the information pertaining to the property tax hike.

news.title: Chandigarh civic body starts sending property tax bills to taxpayers with revised rates in FY25
news.para: The civic body has sent most of the property or service charge-related bills to govt-owned properties, and has now started the process of sending the same to residential and commercial establishments.

news.title: Chennai: Metrowater to install one lakh smart water meters in commercial buildings
news.para: Until now, Metrowater had installed mechanical meters with automated meter reading (AMR) in residential and commercial buildings.

news.title: Delhi's CP sees 14% rise in rent for retail spaces in Q4 FY25: Cushman & Wakefield data
news.para: Khan Market, one of the costliest high-street locations globally, commanded a monthly rental of Rs 1,600-1,650 per sq ft in January-March, an increase of 7 per cent year-on-year.

news.title: Private equity investment in Indian real estate rises 35% to $748 million in Q4 FY25: Savills data
news.para: The majority of this capital was directed toward Bengaluru, Mumbai, Pune and Delhi-NCR, underlining the continued momentum and demand in key Tier I cities, according to Savills.

news.title: RERA registry cannot decide upon maintainability of complaints: Karnataka HC
news.para: The case dates back to 2013, when SJR Prime Corporation Pvt. Ltd. approached Garg with an offer to sell an apartment in the Petronas Block, a 17-storey residential complex.

news.title: Projects with OC applications before May 2017 exempt from registration: Karnataka RERA
news.para: The case was heard by a single-member bench comprising K-RERA Chairman Rakesh Singh and Member GR Reddy, in response to complaints filed by SR Balaji and others from Doddathogur.

news.title: Odisha RERA revokes housing project’s registration
news.para: This is the second instance in the state when the registration certificate of an existing project has been revoked. The project used a railway road for building plan approval as its approach road and received RERA approval.

news.title: Guwahati: Over three lakh houses to get ‘smart’ number plates for streamlining taxation
news.para: The survey is part of the ongoing Smart House Numbering System (SHNS), launched last year, and aims to enhance infrastructure planning, property identification, and municipal services like waste management, emergency response, and taxation.

news.title: Free registration of house sites for poor in Mangalagiri: Andhra Pradesh minister
news.para: Lokesh distributed house sites to about 430 families as part of ‘Mana Illu-Mana Lokesh' programme here on Friday. About 1,030 families have been covered in the last four days.

news.title: Gujarat government to ready first urban transformation document
news.para: Gujarat's 130 development authorities include 16 urban development authorities (UDAs) and 104 area development authorities (ADAs).

news.title: Probe misuse of Socorro scheme meant to build low-income homes: HC to Goa government
news.para: The division bench, comprising justices Bharati Dangre and Nivedita Mehta, directed govt to take action against erring persons.

news.title: Chandigarh administration remains adamant on property tax hike
news.para: With the new financial year underway, all financial works, reports, and related exercises have commenced in the municipal corporation (MC) according to the established process and procedure, without reconsidering the increased property tax, and making this segment of tax a major source of its own income.

news.title: Five FIRs filed against Ansal API in land scam case in Lucknow
news.para: In these FIRs, the victims alleged a fraud valuing more than Rs 50 lakh in the name of providing them plots, flats and shops. The police said further legal action would be taken based on cross-verification of allegations and evidence against the accused.

news.title: Ghaziabad: Only 2,760 of the 17,875 applications eligible for houses under PMAY
news.para: The District Urban Development Agency (DUDA), the nodal agency for distributing grants for constructing dwelling units under the scheme, had identified irregularities in grants last year and launched an investigation.

news.title: Gujarat RERA action against builder for pre-bookings
news.para: According to sources, GujRERA received a complaint from the buyer that the builder had taken Rs 1 lakh as token from him even before getting RERA registration for his project in Gandhinagar district.
